data.eml:eml: A redefinition of Iranothyas Bader, 1984 with the description of a new species from Oman

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pesic, Vladimir, Gerecke, Reinhard, Smit, Harry (2009): A redefinition of Iranothyas Bader, 1984 with the description of a new species from Oman. Zootaxa 2290: 59-64, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.191352
